message.content:
I need to identify the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period from the financial statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement section, I can see a specific line item:
```
Cash and Cash Equivalents
Beginning Balance  | 8000000.00 | 2024-02-04
```

This clearly shows that the beginning balance of cash and cash equivalents was 8,000,000.00.

I can verify this by looking at the balance sheet, which shows:
- Cash on Hand: 3,000,000.00 (2023-12-31)
- Bank Deposits: 5,000,000.00 (2023-12-31)
Together, these two items would constitute cash and cash equivalents, totaling 8,000,000.00 at the beginning of the period.

Therefore, the value of cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period is 8,000,000.00.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '8000000.00'} }
```
